mapper.insert: insert into T_GRADUATE (N_ID, C_PROTOCOLID, C_NAME, C_IDCARD, N_GENDER, C_PEOPLE, C_POLITICALSTATUS, C_COLLEGE, C_PROFESSION, c_gender, C_TEL, D_GRADUATETIME, C_EDUCATION, C_DEGREE, C_ADDRESS) values (#{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{protocolId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{people, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{politicalStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{colleage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profession, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{class, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{graduateTime, jdbcType=DATE}, #{education, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{degree, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update T_GRADUATE set C_PROTOCOLID = #{protocolId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_NAME = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_IDCARD = #{idCard, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, N_GENDER = #{gender, jdbcType=INTEGER}, C_PEOPLE = #{people, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_POLITICALSTATUS = #{politicalStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_COLLEGE = #{colleage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_PROFESSION = #{profession, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_gender = #{class, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_TEL = #{tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, D_GRADUATETIME = #{graduateTime, jdbcType=DATE}, C_EDUCATION = #{education, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_DEGREE = #{degree, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_ADDRESS = #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where N_ID = #{id}
mapper.select: select N_ID, C_PROTOCOLID, C_NAME, C_IDCARD, N_GENDER, C_PEOPLE, C_POLITICALSTATUS, C_COLLEGE, C_PROFESSION, c_gender, C_TEL, D_GRADUATETIME, C_EDUCATION, C_DEGREE, C_ADDRESS from T_GRADUATE where N_ID = #{id}
select N_ID, C_PROTOCOLID, C_NAME, C_IDCARD, N_GENDER, C_PEOPLE, C_POLITICALSTATUS, C_COLLEGE, C_PROFESSION, c_gender, C_TEL, D_GRADUATETIME, C_EDUCATION, C_DEGREE, C_ADDRESS from T_GRADUATE
